paragraph0.text: CS.Money Antiscam {accent} visited and about suspicious activity on user’s account including API-key scams.
paragraph0.accent: keeps user aware about any scam sites

paragraph1.text: Only {accent} can protect your own items. And {accent1}. The choice is yours!

paragraph2.text: Please be aware! We {accent} any information about you or your Steam account.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
frequentlyAskedQuestions.text1: We often face the fact that scammers try to trick our users and steal the inventory. Yes, the world is not perfect, and there are many scammers in the Internet, who each time manage to come up with a new way of dishonest earnings.
frequentlyAskedQuestions.text2: That's why we developed the CS.MONEY Antiscam extension. Our goal is to ensure the security of our users' data.

whatNeedToKnow.title: Here's what you need to know about the app:

protectionFakeSites.text: We have created a huge database of scam sites that copy our site. If a user visits a website that is added to our blacklist, he receives an indication that this is a scam site.

protectionApiKey.text: If the user has an API key generated and logs in CS.MONEY, he receives a warning that he is in danger, because scammers could own his data. You will also be asked to completely clean your account from the scammers by changing your password, revoking the API key and creating a new trade-offer link.

liveAnalysis.text: Despite a large database of scam sites, a new fake site appears every week and we may not be aware of it. If a user visits a site that is a copy of CS.MONEY, our live analysis blocks all actions and gives a warning that this is a scam site.

foundScamSite.accent: Found a new scam site - let us know!
foundScamSite.text: We have added an ability for our users to report scam site. All reported site will be moderated and then added to our database.

extensionWork.title: How does the CS.MONEY Antiscam extension work?
extensionWork.text: - Our extension haven’t got any access to your inventory or Steam account.

mobileVersion.title: Is there a mobile version?
mobileVersion.text: - You can use our extension only on the PC version of Google Chrome.

aboutPersonalInfo.title: Will you collect my personal information via the extension?
aboutPersonalInfo.text: - Our extension is Open Source. Any user can find out what and how we do. Also, in order to be added in Chrome Web Store, we have passed a strict Google moderation. The main goal of our extension is to ensure your safety and it's all free.

whyIsItNeeded.title: Why do I need this extension?
whyIsItNeeded.text: - Even advanced users can be scammed. Our extension will protect you from the most common methods of scamming.

liveAnalysis.title: Potentionaly dangerous site
liveAnalysis.description: Interaction with this site may lead to loss of your Steam account or in-game items. Please, be careful!
liveAnalysis.hint: If you think that this is not a scam, contact @cs.money or @moderator on our Discord server.
liveAnalysis.reportSuccess: We will check the website. Thanks!

scamSiteAnalysis.title: This is a scam site
scamSiteAnalysis.description: You visited fraudelent website. This may lead to the loss of your Steam account or in-game items.
scamSiteAnalysis.hint: If you think that this is not a scam, contact @cs.money or @moderator on our Discord server.
scamSiteAnalysis.linkToReview: Not a scam. Resubmit for review

apiKey.text: {accent} API-key allows scammers to manage your Steam account. It gives an access to the trades, marketplace operations, friend requests and etc.

whyWouldYouCare.text: {accent} There should be no API-key by default. If it's created that means that someone did it without your consent. Scammers can use it to steal your items.

noRegisteredApiKey.text: {accent} we suggest you follow the security steps. To do so, click on 'Security steps' button.

useApiKeyForTrading.accent: If you use API-key for trading,

useApiKey.subtitle: Antiscam notification
useApiKey.description: If you use API-key to automate your trades, click 'OK' button. We won't disturb you with notifications.

steps.subtitle: Step {currentStep} / {maxSteps}
steps.stepsSkipAlert: Don't forget to complete skipped steps too. That's important for account & items safety

stepsDone.title: You are safe!
stepsDone.subtitle: You've completed all steps.
stepsDone.description: If you complete all steps, you all set to trade. Your items are safe now.

wayMoreSecure.text: Let's start with changing your password to {accent} This way scammers won't be able to login to your account.

notRecommended.text: We don't recommend passwords less than 12 characters.

changePassword.text: Click on the button {accent} to do so.

accessAccount.accent: So only you have access to the account.
accessAccount.text: To revoke access from scammers, you should end all active sessions. {accent}

pageBottom.text: You can do that at Steam Guard settings. “Deauthorize all other devices” button is located at {accent}

steamGuard.accent: Do NOT delete your Steam Guard authenticator!

revoke.text: The most important step is to {accent} existing API-key.

domainName.text: {accent} From now on scammers won't be able to control your trades.

fakeTrade.accent: scammers won't be able to send you a fake trade.
fakeTrade.text: We recommend to update it so {accent}

clickButton.text: Click on the button below to do so.

footer.hint: If you need any help, contact @moderator on our Discord server!

fakeLogin.title: Fake login detected
fakeLogin.description: We found fake authorization on this page. Scammers can use it to get control over your account.
fakeLogin.hint: If you think that this is not a scam, contact @cs.money or @moderator on our Discord server.
fakeLogin.reportSuccess: We will check the website. Thanks!

tradeOffer.title: Please, pay attention!
tradeOffer.description: Always check bot {level} and {date} upon mobile app trade confirmation.
tradeOffer.notFriend: You are not friends this user

steamrep.title: Scammer (Defraud, Extortion)
steamrep.description: This user is blocked on the SteamRep platform. Do not respond to this user and do not make trades with him. Please submit a report against this scammer (More -> Report Profile).
